page.title: 10 Rockfield Studios
page.content: 'Pop stars',the performers of modern music provide entertainment and become the idols of numerous young people. In the rural setting near Rockfield is Amberley Court.Although it could be mistaken for one of the numerous farms of the area,it is a recording studio.In recent it has won some renown and has been able to attract such famous 'pop' groups as Adam Ant and Bad Manners. Accomodation is provided at the Court Performers are attracted to the studios not only because it is in a quiet, picturesque location,but also,as it has a well equipped,modern recording studio.Groups are able to perfect their 'sound' in the echo room. Recordings made at Rockfield have ended up on records which have reached music lovers all over the world.To the east is the Nimbus Factory which manufactures the new Compact Discs.
